replies.msg:
Because there is no freedom of speech in China. Also don’t know why so many Chinese are extremely patriotic
So even just some words that saying the downsides of China, that would cause loads of Chinese patriots swear on the ppl with opposing ideas.

in this moment, you can't only see the money as important as freedom. Hong Kong just declared the war with CCP. If now you look to the money and bow to CCP, you will be regret of your whole life.

Money is short, freedom is forever
